body:
Comment 24: 
Does everything work now?

If you go into a directory where it doesn't work,
does which gotest still print the same thing?

The binary you were looking at with gdb was
definitely not the binary that you have now.
The disassembly of main.initÂ·1 in a working
(on your system) binary will contain a call to
_sfloat before any floating point instructions.
The _sfloat function interprets the floating
point itself, in software, and then returns
after skipping over those instructions.

Russ
